nodes.bodyText: Maybe make connectedPlayer.get() to a variable and use that instead of explicitly calling .get
Arguably this is worse than before (even if player lookups are constant). I disagree with @MrIvanPlays, previous code was fine.
This revised code actually introduces a bug.
Yeah, figured such would occur. Will do as i stated previously

This is still incorrect. Now the successful login case is never fired. Your first revision was correct.
To fix this just put this line back where it was - before the unregisterConnection call.
I commented on the wrong line, the offending line is above this one. I was reviewing this from my phone. Whoops!
